item.title: Brightline 的对冲基金债券持有人准备进行债务重组
item.description: 持有 Brightline 11 亿美元公司债务股份的对冲基金正在制定一项计划，通过向陷入困境的高速铁路项目提供新的融资和优惠，将其债权提升到其他类似债权人之上。【原文：Hedge funds with a stake in Brightline’s $1.1 billion of corporate debt are crafting a plan to elevate their claims over other similar creditors by offering new financing and concessions to the struggling high-speed rail project.】

item.title: Ares 首席执行官解释为何不与传统公司合作
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 一直拒绝与其他基金管理公司合作，以通过 401（k）市场等方式接触普通投资者，尽管其他公司也与更传统的公司合作，为大众进行投资。【原文：Ares Management Corp. has resisted partnering with other money managers to reach everyday investors, including through the 401(k) market, even as others team up with more traditional firms to invest for the masses.】

item.title: Netflix 正寻求再次变身 Debtflix，为收购提供资金
item.description: Netflix 是一家依靠垃圾债券发展起来的公司，目前正寻求再次大量借贷。【原文：Netflix, a company that built its business on junk bonds, is looking to borrow heavily again.】

item.title: 卡纳科尔在重组努力中从债券持有人处获得一线生机
item.description: 哥伦比亚最大的天然气生产商 Canacol Energy Ltd. 与一群债券持有人达成协议，将为该公司的债务重组提供急需的融资。【原文：Canacol Energy Ltd., Colombia’s largest gas producer, reached an agreement with a group of bondholders that will provide the company with much needed financing as it works to restructure its debt.】

item.title: YouTube TV 将提供新的订阅捆绑服务，包括体育节目
item.description: YouTube TV 计划在 2026 年初推出 10 多个新的特定类型内容订阅计划，其中包括一个专注于体育的订阅计划。【原文：YouTube TV plans to launch more than 10 new subscription plans for genre-specific content in early 2026, including one focused on sports.】

item.title: 瑞士改进后的 15%美国关税协议将追溯适用
item.description: 瑞士上个月达成的让美国降低对瑞士关税的协议将追溯到协议宣布当天生效。【原文：Switzerland’s agreement last month to get the US to lower tariffs on the country will be backdated to take effect on the day the deal was announced.】

item.title: 特朗普团队延长卢克石油制裁豁免期限，协议谈判重回正轨
item.description: 随着卢克石油公司国外资产出售交易讨论的加快，美国将对该公司部分交易的制裁豁免延长至下个月。【原文：The US extended a sanctions waiver for some Lukoil PJSC transactions until next month as deal discussions over the sale of the firm’s foreign assets picked up.】

item.title: 印度向更广泛的投资开放 1770 亿美元养老金池
item.description: 作为投资规范全面更新的一部分，印度养老金监管机构扩大了国民养老金体系基金经理的投资机会，允许他们更深入地参与股票、债券和另类资产投资。【原文：India’s pension regulator has broadened investment opportunities for National Pension System fund managers, allowing deeper participation in equities, bonds and alternative assets as part of a sweeping update to investment norms.】

item.title: 加拿大养老金巨头对支付费用与私募基金共同投资表示反对
item.description: 全球最大的投资公司之一加拿大养老金计划投资委员会不太可能与私募股权管理公司合作，因为后者会开始向与他们一起投资交易的机构投资者索要费用。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, one of the largest investment firms globally, is unlikely to partner with private equity managers that start demanding fees from institutional investors who invest alongside them in deals.】

item.title: Opendoor 投资者引发 Nextdoor 股价上涨近 50%
item.description: Nextdoor Holdings Inc.周三早盘股价大涨49%，创下四年多来最大涨幅，原因是Opendoor Technologies和Better Home &等零售业巨头的幕后推手Finance Holding Co.看好这款邻里社交媒体应用。【原文：Nextdoor Holdings Inc. shares surged as much as 49% early Wednesday, the most in over four years, as the man behind the retail-driven rally in names like Opendoor Technologies and Better Home & Finance Holding Co. took a bullish stance on the neighborhood social media app.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率维持在 2.25%，经济 "总体保持稳定
item.description: 加拿大央行维持利率稳定，并表示尽管经济似乎比之前想象的更具韧性，但目前的借贷成本水平仍适合减轻贸易战的损害。【原文：The Bank of Canada held interest rates steady and said although the economy appears to be more resilient than previously thought, the current level of borrowing costs is still appropriate to mitigate the trade war damage.】

item.title: 组织称黄金上涨推动全球非法采矿激增
item.description: 据世界黄金协会称，黄金价格的飙升正在推动非正规和无监管的黄金开采业迅速扩张，而这种开采业往往是非法的，对生态环境具有破坏性。【原文：The surge in gold prices is driving a rapid expansion in informal and unregulated gold mining that is often illegal and ecologically destructive, according to the World Gold Council.】

item.title: 华尔街等待美联储决议和鲍威尔讲话，股市大幅下挫
item.description: 周三，美国股市下滑，因为交易员们正准备迎接市场普遍预期的晚些时候降息四分之一点，以及官员们对货币政策轨迹的预测。【原文：US equities slid Wednesday as traders brace for a widely anticipated quarter-point rate cut later in the session, along with projections from officials on the trajectory of monetary policy.】

item.title: PERG 称，由私募股权投资支持的英国大型公司在报告方面存在问题
item.description: 英国一些最大的私募股权投资组合公司仍未遵守近二十年前制定的一套财务报告行业准则中的任何核心内容。【原文：Some of the biggest private equity owned portfolio companies in the UK are still failing to comply with any of the core components of a set of industry guidelines on financial reporting established nearly two-decades ago.】

item.title: 印度航空监察局成立小组监督 IndiGo 的工作
item.description: 印度航空监管机构史无前例地在 IndiGo 公司办公室部署了两个现场小组，以监控这家印度最大航空公司的运营情况。【原文：India’s aviation regulator, in an unprecedented move, deployed two on-site teams at IndiGo’s corporate office to monitor operations at India’s largest carrier, which canceled over 3,000 flights last week and caused massive air disruption.】

item.title: 大选重回焦点，哥伦比亚为市场敲响警钟
item.description: 最近，围绕哥伦比亚史无前例的债务操作的炒作开始消退，暴露出该国在即将举行的总统选举和日益加剧的预算紧张中脆弱的前景。【原文：The recent hype around Colombia’s unprecedented debt maneuvers is starting to fade, exposing the country’s fragile outlook amid upcoming presidential elections and growing budget strains.】

item.title: 匈牙利寄希望于欧盟国防贷款，美国将在 2026 年提供后备帮助

item.title: 美国就业成本增速为 2021 年中以来最慢

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克斯称通胀接近目标但势头正在加快
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）在为 MNI Connect 所做的演讲中表示，虽然通胀率接近 2% 的目标，但 "最近出现了一些回升势头"。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said that while inflation is near the 2% target, there’s been “some pick-up in momentum recently,” according to a presentation for MNI Connect.】

item.title: 博彩公司 Evoke 股价飙升，原因是其潜在出售事宜正在接受审查
item.description: Evoke Plc 周三股价跳涨达 12%，此前这家英国博彩游戏公司表示正在考虑出售整个业务。【原文：Evoke Plc shares jumped as much as 12% on Wednesday after the UK betting and gaming company said it’s looking at potentially selling the entire business.】
